title: Okuwaayo eri Orbital Temple
heading: Maliriza Okuwaayo Kwo
chooseHow: Londa engeri gy’oyagala okumalirizaamu okuwaayo kwo okuggyibwako omusolo:

option1.heading: Eky’okukola 1: Okuwaayo ku mutimbagano Kati
option1.description: Maliriza amangu ddala okuwaayo kwo ng’okozesa kaadi y’okuwola, kaadi y’okusasula, oba enkola endala ez’okusasula ku yintaneeti ng’oyita mu muwagizi waffe ow’ebyensimbi ow’obukuumi, The Field . Ojja kufuna lisiiti y’omusolo mu bwangu.

option2.heading: Eky’okubiri: Okutereka ssente mu bbanka mu The Roy Foundation
option2.description: Teeka ssente butereevu mu bbanka oba okukyusa ku waya eri The Roy Foundation , omukwanaganya waffe ow’enteekateeka era omuwagizi w’ebyensimbi. Enkola eno nnungi nnyo ku kuwaayo okunene oba okukyusa mu nsi yonna.
option2.instructions: Nsaba oteekemu " Orbital Temple - {donationType} " mu kifo eky'okujuliza. Oluvannyuma lw’okumaliriza okukyusa kwo, tuwandiikire ku sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art n’ebikwata ku kukyusa kwo okufuna lisiiti yo ey’omusolo.

taxInfo.heading: Okuwaayo Okuggyibwako Omusolo
taxInfo.description: Orbital Temple ye pulojekiti eyambibwako eby’ensimbi eya The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , ekitongole ekitali kya magoba ekya 501(c)(3) . Ensimbi zonna eza Amerika ziggyibwako omusolo okutuuka ku kigero ekikkirizibwa mu mateeka.
